name: Bounty Hunter (itch) (Muhammad Shahrom Ali)
description:
Project is still under development.

You're in your spaceship, you must evade and shoot down the asteroids headed your way make your way deep into space.

The asteroids will destroy you if they come in contact.

Every Hit is a score. Every asteroid let go of, is a negative score. Do your best and beat your friends' high-scores.

Any and all constructive feedback is welcome. 

Works best for 1920 x 1080
